cdf3e56bacd3895262af8a1df9ca5c81f4071970.commitMessage: Utils class has been splitted to CommonUtils and TokenUtils. Issue #1898

a2b8be14bb1230f1b184701bae8bcc7af102bb25.commitMessage: Fix PMD violations from SimplifyStartsWith rule, issue #949

c0446a825514ea0279b8c22f633f2c4e3c73dc1f.commitMessage:
Fix PMD violations from UseVarargs rule, issue #999

The changes are fully backward-compatible. Method with vararg can be invoked both using array and list of parameters.

00fb7f0c1852eb015933c7c121284597de29caad.commitMessage:
FileSetChecks are now responsible for filtering
out the files they are not interested in, as discussed
on the checkstyle-devel list
